name: Reset Your Password
subject: Reset Your Password
body_html:
Hello {username}!

Use the link below to reset your password.

<a href="{reset_password_link}">{reset_password_link}</a>

Thanks,

Matt
body_plain: Hello {username}!Use the link below to reset your password.{reset_password_link}Thanks,Matt

name: Confirm your email
subject: Confirm your email
body_html:
Hello {username}!

Thanks for registering, please use the link below to confirm your email.

<a href="{confirm_email_link}">{confirm_email_link}</a>

Thanks!

Matt
body_plain: Hello {username}!Thanks for registering, please use the link below to confirm your email.{confirm_email_link}Thanks!Matt
